content: I&#039m not that kind of person.I, Dion Hart, am a sickly person who vomits blood whenever I&#039m stressed.However, at the same time, I&#039m Count Hart, who has somehow been misunderstood and thought of as a strong person, and thereby feared by everyone.---I am a sickly person who vomits blood whenever I get stressed. Deon Hart. However, at the same time as Honorary Count Hart, who is somehow misunderstood as strong and feared by everyone in the Empire, In the demon realm, he became the comman
